website_summaries.verdict: A powder foundation that is a nice alternative to liquid and cream formulas. It feels good on the face and is compatible with all skin types.
pros: Lightweight powder foundation that provides medium to full coverage
Doesn't contain talc but is formulated with powdered Amazonian clay that feels silky on the face
cons: Finding the perfect shade can be challenging

customer_reviews.title: Only powder I'll use.
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite powder. Gives my skin full coverage like foundation but doesn't leave my skin oily. It also doesn't over dry my skin like some powders. The color is the perfect match for me after going into a Sephora and doing a color test. I like that it doesn't have a ton of chemicals in it either.
customer_reviews.author: Carly B.

customer_reviews.title: Yes,  you need it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about the foundation. This is now my 3rd purchase of this one. It feels very light on the skin, but covers very well. Does not sit in fine lines, or creases in the eyes. Leaves a very nice flawless finish when used as a finishing powder. I have used the matching foundation under it as well as drug store foundation. Both performed the same. If you need a good coerce finishing powder definitely try this one out.
customer_reviews.author: audrey theis

customer_reviews.title: Kinda disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Tarte is easily one of my favorite beauty brands so I was super excited to try this. It works okay, it takes a ton of blending to make it look even and the coverage isn't as good as I thought. Wouldn't spend 35$ on it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product bad color
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but the color that was shipped does not match the description of the product. I was looking for light medium. I received tan sand. It’s wayyyyy too dark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just like to reduce shine
customer_reviews.text: I don't need a lot of coverage, I just like to reduce shine. But I love how this Tarte powder evens out my skin tone. It's just a tad dark on my fair, winter skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: A good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price..and arrived in my mail box very quickly! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: good foundation
customer_reviews.text: Just ran out of my 1st purchase of Tarte mineral powder--it lasted 5 yrs. Feels like liquid foundation when on skin.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how this got so many stars I think it's horrible. Color leaves me looking yellowish and the powder is hard to get out. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Monica W.

customer_reviews.title: Charge too much!
customer_reviews.text: I could’ve ordered it from tarte for a lot less money
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Westfall

customer_reviews.title: I love the Tarte Amazonian Clay - will buy again
customer_reviews.text: One of the only foundations/powders that doesn't irritate my Very sensitive skin. I love the Tarte Amazonian Clay - will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: How do I get Medium Netural makeup instead of Light Med. Netural
customer_reviews.text: I wanted Medium Netural makeup instead of Light Medium Netural. There's a big diference in color. This one is too light for me.
customer_reviews.author: ACDC

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this powder!!! I used this with some light coverage foundations and I would look flawless! I could even skip the foundation and just use this powder and I'd still slay! Love love love this Product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aubry bigsby

customer_reviews.title: 11/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: The best powder I've ever used. Only need to apply once for the whole day. Very natural looking, especially after spraying rose water on my face after applying.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pollara

customer_reviews.title: ... makeups in my life and this one is the best.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different makeups in my life and this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: FraggleRock

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Great coverage, looks a little cakey if you wear it on top of anything more than moisturizer. Goes on smooth, lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Did not like this make up at all
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this make up at all. Don't like the texture or how it feels on my face. Wasted money in my book.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Loose Powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this loose powder. I have tried many- from drug stores brands to high brand names (i.e. CD, Chanel, Lancome); however, I always default back to this one. It goes on evenly (full coverage) and last all day; It is made with all natural ingredients; Does not break me out; Does not feel heavy as if I have a mask on my face; Could handle perspiration well; Photographs well; AND it is animal cruelty free! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love everything TARTE
customer_reviews.text: I love everything TARTE. I apply this powder over my regular foundation to seal things in. It's also great on it's own. The prices are going up in Tarte world so I am not sure I will be able to continue affording it but it's a great powder!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Not as Expected.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this Jan 9th and i was so Excited to get it after 11 long days of anticipation. To my surprise all the Hype about the amazonian clay and gemstones was just that. It was NOT my color way too pinky. I am medium tone and have yellow and green undertones. I like my MAC mineral powder and my Mac studio fix powders much better. I am sad it wasn't a match for me. I may try another color but not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Bellisima

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tarte powder is the best! I've been using it for years and will never use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Seybert

customer_reviews.title: perfect product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing coverage, easy to apply and looks flawless but natural.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tarte never seems to disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: Love Tarte. It goes on smonth the perfect shade and it lasts a long time. I have the brush as well so perfect combination.
customer_reviews.author: zgirly62

customer_reviews.title: Tarte is Number 1
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Just broke me out. My skin is senitive, company was wonderful to let me send back. I use the Tarte Primer with no problem. BEST PRIMER I HAVE EVER FOUND.
customer_reviews.author: Ellana D.

customer_reviews.title: First time to try Tarte and I love it. Very competitive pricing compared to other brands
customer_reviews.text: First time to try Tarte and I love it. Very competitive pricing compared to other brands. Coverage is great and feels good on skin.
customer_reviews.author: kiristen biggerstaff

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I also ordered the foundation which is great but this stuff is just junk a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: T.W.

customer_reviews.title: I dust this on after using the Tarte Amazonian Clay ...
customer_reviews.text: I dust this on after using the Tarte Amazonian Clay 12-hour Full Coverage foundation. Personally, I don't think the coverage is "full coverage" in the powder, but it works for the purpose I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: This product offers full coverage without looking like theatrical make up
customer_reviews.text: Previously purchased this item from Sephora but ordering from Amazon, especially with the Prime 2 day shipping, is so much easier. There was about a 10 dollar savings as well. This product offers full coverage without looking like theatrical make up. Stays on all day and stays in place! My skin is a bit oily and I feel like this Amazonian clay product helps control shine. Also, the kabuki brush for application is a must, in my opinion! The product last about 4 months using it 6 times a week. Will continue to purchase this through Amazon until the winter arrives and I need to be matched to a new shade.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me from having to apply makeup during the day. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Kinzel

customer_reviews.title: High quality natural foundation
customer_reviews.text: Stays on. I have to use a primer to not look wrinkly. I used it to replace my bare minerals foundation. I've got sun damaged slightly dry skin. Will set in some wrinkles if I don't use care on application. I like the clay but maybe if I was 10 years younger it would be perfect. 20-40.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law, who is an aestheticism told me about this make up and I just love it. Great coverage and stays on all day!
customer_reviews.author: c. hunt

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: This powder does not offer enough full coverage alone, for me personally (I love extra full coverage) but I do love it on top of a liquid foundation. I have really oily skin so I need to reapply after about 8 hours, but it looks great after a touch up. I love the mesh inside of the container to keep the powder from spilling everywhere. I will be buying this again and I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really have the pigment that I wanted... I wouldn't say full coverage
customer_reviews.author: Momofboys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years and can't be without it!
customer_reviews.author: MSF

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for this product in a shade that is a tad darker, but can't find it.
customer_reviews.author: Nekochan

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage for powder. Really like for everyday. Feels light and I look put together.
customer_reviews.author: finewine

customer_reviews.title: I did not expect to like this as much as I do
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect to like this as much as I do. It works great alone, or on top of a foundation. It leaves my face looking great. It covers hyperpigmentation and age spots, and doesn't crease under my eyes. I love that it makes my eyebrow product stick a bit better. I can't believe how well this stuff works.
customer_reviews.author: lbowlus

customer_reviews.title: Bye to Bare Minerals-Hello Tarte!
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Bare Minerals and wanted to try something different. This goes on a lot smoother and matches my skin tone perfectly. I am now addicted to the Tarte!!
customer_reviews.author: M. T.

customer_reviews.title: Tarte makes great products - I just wish they weren't so darned expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Tarte makes great products - I just wish they weren't so darned expensive. Last time I bought this powder it was under $40 but now I see it's like $57 - that's CRAZY! Luckily they only have to be applied once, but still, I may have to look for another brand of equal quality that doesn't charge so much.
customer_reviews.author: rachellexicon

customer_reviews.title: I just absolutely love any kind of Tarte makeup and cannot live without ...
customer_reviews.text: I just absolutely love any kind of Tarte makeup and cannot live without the Mascara! Try it! It's so light and airy like you have nothing on!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce S. Collins

product_meta.title: Tarte Amazonian Clay Full Coverage Airbrush Foundation Light-Medium Neutral 0.247 oz
product_meta.description:
Vegan, 12-hour, waterproof powder foundation.
Powered by Amazonian clay and light-reflecting gemstones.
feature_bullets: This hypoallergenic foundation gives you natural radiance and matte coverage in a weightless, flake-free powder. The full coverage formula is all you need to cover redness, unevenness and pores, with Amazonian clay to help control oil and make your makeup last. Precious gemstone tourmaline works to energize skin and diffuse light for natural dimension, and the custom mesh applicator offers buildable and breathable coverage without settling into fine lines.

Skinvigorating ingredients - Amazonian clay: Nature's most perfect ingredient for better, longer, truer wear. Tourmaline: Natural gemstone known to energize skin for a brighter, more radiant complexion. Pearl powder: Mineral-rich powder known for its naturally invigorating, anti-aging properties Camellia leaf extract: Natural antioxidant that helps fight free radicals. Mineral pigments: Soothe and soften skin
Benefits: Vegan, Hypoallergenic, Tarte 12-hour power, Waterproof, Dermatologist tested, Cruelty-free
Color: Fair-Light Neutral (fair to light w/ yellow and pink undertones)
